### visitLocationList() {#ae386da186965d9d9ce64e0cc1450814d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error DWARFDebugLoc::visitLocationList (uint64&#95;t &#42; Offset, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt; bool(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarflocationentry">DWARFLocationEntry</a> &amp;)&gt; Callback) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Call the user-provided callback for each entry (including the end-of-list entry) in the location list starting at <code>Offset</code>.

The callback can return false to terminate the iteration early. Returns an error if it was unable to parse the entire location list correctly. Upon successful termination <code>Offset</code> will be updated point past the end of the list.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugloc-h/#l00114">114</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugloc-h">DWARFDebugLoc.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugloc-cpp/#l00207">207</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfdebugloc-cpp">DWARFDebugLoc.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
